::Mosquitor/The Cybertronian Fire/Kluster::

With a battle cry, Mosquitor rushes past Inferno and company, heading toward 
the Cybertronian Fire. "DIE MAXIMALS!!!" he yells.

On the ship, a missile launcher calmly turns to target the insect, firing a 
single missile after getting a lock.

Mosquitor's eyes widen as he sees the missile coming at him. The Pred raises 
both hand, trying to block the missile. With a huge explosion, Mosquitor's 
noew-charred body is blown back, smashing into the ground several times and 
flipping over backwards before coming to a stop behind the rest of the 
Predacon forces.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The shots fired by Rampage and Scourge are hit the shields of the 
Cybertronian Fire, barely making it onto the energy readings. Three of the 
laser batteries target Rampage, firing at him while the missile launcher that 
had just taken Mosquitor out of the battle targets Scourge, firing a 
signature-seeking missile at him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster exits the ship, seeing the battle going. "Let's hurry," he says to 
Phobia, speeding up toward Phobia's ship.
